Uses of Class
org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels.StoredServerChannel

  • Packages that use StoredServerChannel 
    Package Description
    org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels
    Micropayment channels allow for rapid tiny payments to be made to a third party once a channel has been set up, using some of the advanced features of the Bitcoin protocol.

    • Uses of StoredServerChannel in org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels

      Fields in org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels declared as StoredServerChannel 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected StoredServerChannel PaymentChannelServerState.storedServerChannel 
      Methods in org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels that return StoredServerChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StoredServerChannel StoredPaymentChannelServerStates.getChannel(Sha256Hash id)
      Gets the StoredServerChannel with the given channel id (ie contract transaction hash).
      Methods in org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels that return types with arguments of type StoredServerChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<Sha256Hash,StoredServerChannel> StoredPaymentChannelServerStates.getChannelMap()
      Get a copy of all StoredServerChannels
      Methods in org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels with parameters of type StoredServerChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StoredPaymentChannelServerStates.closeChannel(StoredServerChannel channel)
      Closes the given channel using ServerConnectionEventHandler.closeChannel() and PaymentChannelServerState.close() to notify any connected client of channel closure and to complete and broadcast the latest payment transaction.
      void StoredPaymentChannelServerStates.putChannel(StoredServerChannel channel)
      Puts the given channel in the channels map and automatically closes it 2 hours before its refund transaction becomes spendable.
      void StoredPaymentChannelServerStates.updatedChannel(StoredServerChannel channel)
      Notifies the set of stored states that a channel has been updated.
